name: Easy Baked Doughnuts
author: JESSICALKING
summary: These easy baked doughnuts are great when you need a quick sweet treat or a breakfast for kids.
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix baking mix, milk, egg, 2 tablespoons sugar, and cinnamon together in a bowl with a whisk, beating vigorously for 20 strokes
Transfer dough to a floured work surface and knead 5 times
Roll dough into 1/2-inch thickness and cut with a floured doughnut cutter
Place doughnuts onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through and lightly browned, 7 to 9 minutes
Pour melted butter into a bowl
Place 1/2 cup sugar in a separate bowl
Dip doughnuts into butter; transfer to sugar and lightly press until doughnuts are coated
